mapper.select: select * from (select row_number() over(order by item_class desc,item_code) rnum,item_code,item_name,item_price,item_class,item_grade,item_img,item_gender from item where upper(item_gender)!=#{playerGender} and item_grade!='default') where rnum between #{startNo} and #{endNo}

select * from (select row_number() over(order by item_code) rnum,item_code,item_name,item_price,item_class,item_grade,item_img,item_gender from item where upper(item_gender)!=#{playerGender} and item_class=#{itemClass} and item_grade!='default') where rnum between #{startNo} and #{endNo}
